name: products-repo
description: A standalone project meant to live in it's own repo and be owned by an autonomous team.
author: Jacob Ebey

scripts.setup:aws: aws --endpoint-url=http://localhost:4572 s3 mb s3://federated-gql-products && aws --endpoint-url=http://localhost:4572 s3api put-bucket-acl --bucket federated-gql-products --acl public-read
